forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 64F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 21C. NE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 69F. NE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
